page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: EXTENSIVE RECREATIONAL FACILITES HAVE ALREADY BEEN PROVIDED IN THE NEW TOWN AND MORE ARE PLANNED. THE TOWNGATE THEATRE AND ARTS CENTRE WERE OPENED IN 1968 AND THROUGHOUT THE YEAR THEY PROVIDE A VARIED PROGRAMME CATERING FOR ALL TASTES. WITHIN THE AREA IS A CHAMPIONSHIP-SIZED SWIMMING POOL AND A BOATING LAKE, A GOLF COURSE,INDOOR SPORTS CENTRE,A LARGE NUMBER OF TENNIS AND NETBALL COURTS,CRICKET PITCHES, FOOTBALL PITCHES AND A BOWLING GREEN. ALL THESE ARE MUNICIPALY OWNED. ALSO WITH IN THE AREA BUT PRIVATELY-OWNED IS A HUGE SQUASH COMPLEX AND AN INDOOR EQUESTRIAN CENTRE. THERE RE MORE THAT 300 SPORTS,SOCIAL AND CULTURAL SOCIETIES FOR ADULTS AND YOUNG PEOPLE.
